languages.text: Хотя силы гарнизона и уступали в подготовке боевикам, благодаря благословенн{mf|ому|ой} Лорд-капитану, взявше{mf|му|й} на себя личное руководство операцией, им сопутствовал успех. Основные силы повстанцев были оттеснены от сельскохозяйственных производств в островные, не представляющие ценности местности.

traits.locale_text: Хотя силы планетарной обороны и уступали в подготовке боевикам, благодаря благословенн{mf|ому|ой} Лорд-капитану, взявше{mf|му|й} на себя личное руководство операцией, им сопутствовал успех. Основные силы повстанцев были оттеснены от сельскохозяйственных производств в островные, не представляющие ценности местности.

languages.text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.
languages.original_text: Хотя силы гарнизона и уступали в подготовке боевикам, благодаря благословенн{mf|ому|ой} Лорд-капитану, взявше{mf|му|й} на себя личное руководство операцией, им сопутствовал успех. Основные силы повстанцев были оттеснены от сельскохозяйственных производств в островные, не представляющие ценности местности.

traits.locale_text: Although the planetary defense forces were less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

Although the planetary defense forces were less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

Although the planetary defense forces were less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

languages.text: 惑星守備隊は反乱軍ほど訓練されていなかったものの、この作戦を直接指揮した祝福受けしロード・キャプテンのおかげで総督軍が勝利した。反乱軍の主力は農業生産エリアから排除され、経済的価値のない離島地域へ移った。
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: 惑星守備隊は反乱軍ほど訓練されていなかったものの、この作戦を直接指揮した祝福受けしロード・キャプテンのおかげで総督軍が勝利した。反乱軍の主力は農業生産エリアから排除され、経済的価値のない離島地域へ移った。

languages.text: 尽管行星驻军的整体训练水平不如叛军，但在神皇保佑的舰长大人亲自指挥下，总督的部队依然取得了胜利。叛军主力被赶出了农业生产区，被逼入了没有任何经济价值的岛屿地区。
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: 尽管行星驻军的整体训练水平不如叛军，但在神皇保佑的舰长大人亲自指挥下，总督的部队依然取得了胜利。叛军主力被赶出了农业生产区，被逼入了没有任何经济价值的岛屿地区。

languages.text: Aunque la guarnición planetaria estaba peor preparada que los rebeldes, las tropas de la gobernadora se alzaron victoriosas gracias a la intervención personal {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} en la operación. El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes fueron expulsadas de las zonas de producción agrícola y tuvieron que retirarse a regiones insulares sin ningún valor económico.
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: Aunque la guarnición planetaria estaba peor preparada que los rebeldes, las tropas de la gobernadora se alzaron victoriosas gracias a la intervención personal {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} en la operación. El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes fueron expulsadas de las zonas de producción agrícola y tuvieron que retirarse a regiones insulares sin ningún valor económico.

languages.text: Obwohl die Garnison des Planeten schlechter ausgebildet war als die Rebellen, blieben die Truppen der Gouverneurin siegreich – dank des gesegneten Lord Captain, der die Operation persönlich befehligte. Die Hauptstreitkräfte der Rebellen wurden aus den landwirtschaftlichen Produktionsgebieten in Inselgebiete ohne wirtschaftlichen Wert vertrieben.
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: Obwohl die Garnison des Planeten schlechter ausgebildet war als die Rebellen, blieben die Truppen der Gouverneurin siegreich – dank des gesegneten Lord Captain, der die Operation persönlich befehligte. Die Hauptstreitkräfte der Rebellen wurden aus den landwirtschaftlichen Produktionsgebieten in Inselgebiete ohne wirtschaftlichen Wert vertrieben.

languages.text: Même si la garnison planétaire manquait d'entraînement par rapport aux rebelles, les troupes de la gouverneure parvinrent à s'imposer grâce {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, qui prit personnellement les rênes de l'opération. Le gros des forces rebelles fut ainsi chassé des zones de production agricole et forcé de se réfugier dans des îles sans intérêt économique.
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: Même si la garnison planétaire manquait d'entraînement par rapport aux rebelles, les troupes de la gouverneure parvinrent à s'imposer grâce {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, qui prit personnellement les rênes de l'opération. Le gros des forces rebelles fut ainsi chassé des zones de production agricole et forcé de se réfugier dans des îles sans intérêt économique.

languages.text: Gezegen garnizonu isyancılar kadar eğitimli olmasa da operasyonun komutasını yüce Lord Kaptan'ın devralması sayesinde valinin birlikleri galip geldi. İsyancı güçler, tarım üretim bölgelerinden ekonomik değeri olmayan adalara sürüldü.
languages.original_text: Although the planetary garrison was less well trained than the rebels, thanks to the blessed Lord Captain, who took personal command of the operation, the governor's troops were victorious. The main rebel forces were pushed out of agricultural production areas into island regions of no economic value.

traits.locale_text: Gezegen garnizonu isyancılar kadar eğitimli olmasa da operasyonun komutasını yüce Lord Kaptan'ın devralması sayesinde valinin birlikleri galip geldi. İsyancı güçler, tarım üretim bölgelerinden ekonomik değeri olmayan adalara sürüldü.
